description: Ground beef chili with beans, tomatoes, and smoky spices, paired with baked sweet potato fries.

imagePrompt.base: Hyper-realistic close-up of Weeknight Beef Chili plated elegantly on a white plate. Pure white studio background, natural window lighting, shallow depth of field. Showcase vibrant colors, gentle steam, and fresh garnish that highlights texture.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Hyper-realistic, eye-level close-up of hearty Weeknight Beef Chili, artfully scooped into a deep, rustic white bowl. A vibrant swirl of tender beef, beans, and tomatoes, crowned with a sprinkle of fresh cilantro and a few golden, crispy sweet potato fries. Soft, warm natural window light accentuates gentle steam and rich textures. Shallow depth of field.
